text: Seems google chrome update is seeing sandbox links as phishing links. Anyone else experiencing it?
What are the "must attend" events/sessions/breakouts for developers at Inbound this year?
can you dm me some examples where you are seeing this?
also to confirm, its this version `Version 85.0.4183.102 (Official Build) (64-bit)` where you are seeing this
I'll get the links hang on.
Version 85.0.4183.102 (Official Build) (64-bit)
Are you still seeing this?

*Blurring the Lines Between Websites & Web Apps with CMS Hub Enterprise* - Will Spiro

<https://www.inbound.com/inbound2020agenda?agendaPath=session/295908>

*An introduction to CMS Hub* - Alex Girard
<https://www.inbound.com/inbound2020agenda?agendaPath=session/296045>

Not 100% sure, but this is also likely going to be useful for developers but may be taught from a marketer perspective.

*Puppies, Drones, and House Calls: How to Store Anything in HubSpot* - Kyle Jepson
<https://www.inbound.com/inbound2020agenda?agendaPath=session/297424>
No session number on that last link <@U7SL518D6> would love to know which one you meant
ahh sorry 1 moment will find it again
<https://www.inbound.com/inbound2020agenda?agendaPath=session/297424>
Thanks dude! (had to turn off brave blocking lol)

*Ask Me Anything Live: SEO & Acquisition Marketing with Matthew Howells-Barby*
<https://www.inbound.com/inbound2020agenda?agendaPath=session/291964>

Since it’s an AMA and majority folks likely will be marketers, it may skew more on the marketing side, that said SEO is a topic that affects both audiences.

:robot_face::robot_face::robot_face:
Who is interested, or already building, Apps on top of our CMS?
:robot_face::robot_face::robot_face:

We're kicking off a new program you might be interested in.
:point_right: Plz comment or DM me

Is there any way to do a batch upsert and ignore email address errors?

I want to automate an import of a few 1000 records, but the only way I can do it is using the import per single record, but I need to add a `sleep()` so that I don't exceed the API threshold, but then it takes up to 30 minutes to import 1000's of records...
Hey everyone quick question I want to use Stripe API in a JS file for a form/purchasing submission is this possible in HubSpot CMS?

:tada: Hey everyone! Many of you likely received your official invite to *<http://developers.HubSpot.com/developer-day-2020|Developer Day 2020>* today by email.  :tada:

:bulb: We're really excited to see all of you there! The 2.5 hour event on October 1st will feature your fellow community developers sharing their wisdom on all things HubSpot development. We are still accepting <https://forms.gle/6dtWmeigTVBxvNmn8|talk submissions> till tomorrow if you have a great idea! :bulb:

:female-technologist: Not only will you hear from your fellow developers, but our developer relations team will be walking you through some of the advances we made for developers in 2020. :developers-developers-developers:

:cool: As if that wasn't enough, HubSpot's CTO and Co-Founder Dharmesh Shah and our VP and GM of Ecosystem Nancy Riley will be doing a visionary fireside chat you won't want to miss! :star-struck:

:jack_o_lantern: See you on *<https://developers.HubSpot.com/developer-day-2020|October 1st>!* :jack_o_lantern:
Also - Come to <http://developers.HubSpot.com/developer-day-2020|Developer Day> a week after INBOUND!

Hi everyone, I’m new to the group, so I hope this is the correct channel for posting, but I was hoping to get some help with a couple issues a customer of mine has been facing with HubSpot and my product.

A general question I have is: Is it possible to disable/bypass HubSpot’s CDN layer entirely?
nope

Thanks Felix. I’m trying to use a separate CDN (Cloudfront) on top of HubSpot and the issue I face is the site functions fine, but if I use the cloudfront CNAME, HubSpot says my domain is no longer connected and I cannot publish new content to my website so I’m trying to find a solution
We are interested
